  1. # 2 "asmcomp/power/scheduling.ml"

  17. (* Instruction scheduling for the Power PC *)

  19. open Arch
  20. open Mach

  22. class scheduler = object

  24. inherit Schedgen.scheduler_generic

  26. (* Latencies (in cycles). Based roughly on the "common model". *)

  28. method oper_latency = function
  29.     Ireload -> 2
  30.   | Iload _ -> 2
  31.   | Iconst_float _ -> 2 (* turned into a load *)
  32.   | Iconst_symbol _ -> 1
  33.   | Iintop(Imul | Imulh) -> 9
  34.   | Iintop_imm(Imul, _) -> 5
  35.   | Iintop(Idiv | Imod) -> 36
  36.   | Iaddf | Isubf -> 4
  37.   | Imulf -> 5
  38.   | Idivf -> 33
  39.   | Ispecific(Imultaddf | Imultsubf) -> 5
  40.   | _ -> 1

  42. method! reload_retaddr_latency = 12
  43.   (* If we can have that many cycles between the reloadretaddr and the
  44.      return, we can expect that the blr branch will be completely folded. *)

  46. (* Issue cycles.  Rough approximations. *)

  48. method oper_issue_cycles = function
  49.     Iconst_float _ | Iconst_symbol _ -> 2
  50.   | Iload { addressing_mode = Ibased(_, _); _ } -> 2
  51.   | Istore(_, Ibased(_, _), _) -> 2
  52.   | Ialloc _ -> 4
  53.   | Iintop(Imod) -> 40 (* assuming full stall *)
  54.   | Iintop(Icomp _) -> 4
  55.   | Iintop_imm(Icomp _, _) -> 4
  56.   | Ifloatofint -> 9
  57.   | Iintoffloat -> 4
  58.   | _ -> 1

  60. method! reload_retaddr_issue_cycles = 3
  61.   (* load then stalling mtlr *)

  63. end

  65. ‌let fundecl f = (new scheduler)#schedule_fundecl f
